name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wonder Tab - Smarter New Tab with Calendar, Bookmarks & ChatGPT

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your productivity hub with quick access to calendar, bookmarks, search, and an AI chat powered by ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet Wonder Tab – Your Smarter New Tab with Calendar, Bookmarks & ChatGPT!

Wonder Tab turns your browser’s new tab page into a productivity hub with easy access to essential tools and a built-in AI assistant. Here’s what makes Wonder Tab unique:

- AI Chat at Your Fingertips: Instantly start a conversation with our AI assistant powered by ChatGPT. Get quick answers, writing suggestions, or have a friendly chat – all for free!
- Integrated Calendar: Stay organized with a built-in Google Calendar widget to keep track of your events and tasks.
- Smart Bookmarks: Pin your favorite sites for instant access, keeping everything important just one click away.
- Smarter Browsing: Enjoy seamless access to powerful tools designed to make your browsing experience easier and more productive.

Whether you’re managing your schedule, saving your favorite websites, or chatting with an AI assistant, Wonder Tab makes it all simple and accessible. And we’re constantly improving with more features to come!

Transform your new tab into a smarter, more personalized experience with Wonder Tab today.
